name: Snowball?
description:
My first game ever finished  :)

You are a snowball rolling down an endless hill, while constantly gaining size. You have to dodge obstacles in order not to lose size. If you lose too much snow, you die.

Press SPACE to activate the flames, which make you invulnerable for 3 secounds.

Made for: My First Game Jam: Winter 2020

Credits/Assets used:

Snow Material: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/4-snow-materials-high-quality-materials-collection-69201

Snow Trees: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vegetation/trees/snowy-low-poly-trees-76796

Snow Stones: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/hand-painted-stones-in-the-snow-62518

Power Ups: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/powerup-particles-16458
